subject: Doping (Sports)
Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Behind Chris Davis’s major-league-leading 50th home run, the Orioles snapped a three-game losing streak and kept pace in the American League wild-card race.
snippet: Behind Chris Davis’s major-league-leading 50th home run, the Orioles snapped a three-game losing streak and kept pace in the American League wild-card race.
